data.event: Fremont was laid out in 1856 in anticipation that the railroad would be extended to that site.
Due to the town's geographically central location, the First Transcontinental Telegraph line (1861), railroad (1866) and highway (1913) passed through or very near Fremont.

event.title: January 10, 1976, in downtown Fremont, the Pathfinder Hotel exploded

data.event: On January 10, 1976, in downtown Fremont, the Pathfinder Hotel exploded due to a natural gas leak in the basement.
